coffee.name: Cappuccino
coffee.description: Has a creamy texture achieved by steamed milk,milk foam and espresso.

coffee.name: Espresso
coffee.description: A strong coffee brewed by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee beans.

coffee.name: Latte
coffee.description: A coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk.

coffee.name: Mocha
coffee.description: A chocolate-flavored variant of a latte.

coffee.name: Americano
coffee.description: A style of coffee prepared by diluting espresso with hot water.

coffee.name: Black Coffee
coffee.description: An espresso coffee drink with a small amount of steamed milk.
